content:
You're most welcome! I'm excited for you to start your journey in The Continent. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need clarification on anything. I'll be here, ready to help you navigate the world of The Witcher.

Remember, the show is just the beginning. If you enjoy it, there are books, video games, and even comics to explore, each offering a unique take on the world and characters.

Now, go ahead and immerse yourself in the world of The Continent. Let the Continent's magic, politics, and monsters captivate you!

Feel better soon, and happy watching!
